FuncDef: The reset logbuffer command deletes logs in a log buffer.
Examples: Warning: This command will reset the log buffer. Logs in the buffer will be lost. Continue? [Y/N]: y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To delete all logs in the log buffer, run the reset logbuffer command.
Precautions
Logs cannot be restored after being deleted. Exercise caution when running the reset logbuffer command.
